items.title: BEL and Tata Electronics to co-develop indigenous semiconductor solutions
items.description: BEL and Tata Electronics will explore opportunities to collaborate in Semiconductor Fabrication and Outsourced Semiconductor Assembly and Testing (OSAT), along with design services solutions, which will be offered by Tata Electronics.

items.title: Indraprastha Gas says not looking at CNG price hikes for now, but closely watching international prices
items.description: CGD players including IGL, MGL and Adani Total Gas have undertaken multiple CNG price hikes in-line with the cut in allocation of cheaper domestic gas. APM gas is sold cheaper to city gas distribution players to ensure essential services such as domestic PNG and CNG.

items.title: India spent $100 billion on clean energy in 2024, China $627 billion, say IEA
items.description: India looks set to reach its 2030 target of 50% non-fossil generation capacity ahead of schedule. There has been a surge in investment in renewables, led by solar PV, IEA has said in a report

items.title: The sectors and stocks that gain from RBI’s outsized monetary stimulus
items.description: The expansionary monetary policy aims to invigorate both investment and consumption, benefiting a cross-section of sectors
